events.id: IFF - Comandante-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Comandante
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- The true story of Comandante Salvatore Todaro, Captain of an Italian Royal Navy submarine. When Todaro sinks an enemy ship, he reaches a decision that is destined to make history: putting his crew at huge risk he decides to rescue the 26 survivors. ---

Italian, English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- The true story of Comandante Salvatore Todaro, Captain of an Italian Royal Navy submarine.
When Todaro sinks an enemy ship, he reaches a decision that is destined to make history: putting his crew at huge risk he decides to rescue the 26 survivors.
--- Italian, English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Gloria!-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Gloria!
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Gloria! tells the story of Teresa, a young woman with a visionary talent who, together with a small group of extraordinary musicians, crosses centuries and challenges the dusty old world of classical music by inventing rebellious, modern music. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Gloria!
tells the story of Teresa, a young woman with a visionary talent who, together with a small group of extraordinary musicians, crosses centuries and challenges the dusty old world of classical music by inventing rebellious, modern music.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Il Boemo-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Il Boemo
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- The extraordinary and unknown story of Josef Myslivecek -"Il Boemo"-one of the most prolific opera composers in 18th century Italy, who was a friend and inspiration to Mozart. He was sought after by the courts of Naples and Venice, while his love life was inextricably entwined with his Musical brilliance. ---

Italian, Czech, French, German
events.description:
Details --- The extraordinary and unknown story of Josef Myslivecek -"Il Boemo"-one of the most prolific opera composers in 18th century Italy, who was a friend and inspiration to Mozart.
He was sought after by the courts of Naples and Venice, while his love life was inextricably entwined with his Musical brilliance.
--- Italian, Czech, French, German

events.id: IFF - Il Postino-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Il Postino
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When Nobel Prize-winning Chilean poet Pablo Neruda is exiled to the island of Procida, he captures the attention of the local postman, Mario. The power of language and poetry opens Mario’s mind and expands his horizons, and soon, he wishes to use the newly discovered power of words to woo the beautiful Beatrice. ---

Italian, Spanish
events.description:
Details --- When Nobel Prize-winning Chilean poet Pablo Neruda is exiled to the island of Procida, he captures the attention of the local postman, Mario.
The power of language and poetry opens Mario’s mind and expands his horizons, and soon, he wishes to use the newly discovered power of words to woo the beautiful Beatrice.
--- Italian, Spanish

events.id: IFF - In the Mirror-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - In the Mirror
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When Monica loses her memory, she creates meaning in her life by identifying with the characters from films of the Golden Age of Italian cinema. In an act of love, Edoardo indulges her imagination, allowing it to become their new life. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- When Monica loses her memory, she creates meaning in her life by identifying with the characters from films of the Golden Age of Italian cinema.
In an act of love, Edoardo indulges her imagination, allowing it to become their new life.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - L'immensità-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - L'immensità
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- In one volatile summer in the 1970’s, Andrea and her family move into a stylish new apartment on the outskirts of Rome. As her marriage breaks down, she is formidable in keeping things buoyant, but Andrea begins to reject her identity and gender, deciding to live like a boy. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- In one volatile summer in the 1970’s, Andrea and her family move into a stylish new apartment on the outskirts of Rome.
As her marriage breaks down, she is formidable in keeping things buoyant, but Andrea begins to reject her identity and gender, deciding to live like a boy.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Maria Montessori-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Maria Montessori
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- A glamorous Parisian actress flees to Rome to protect her reputation and hide her daughter's learning disability. There, she meets Maria Montessori, a brilliant doctor who is developing a methodology for non-conventional children, but Maria has a secret of her own. ---

Italian and French
events.description:
Details --- A glamorous Parisian actress flees to Rome to protect her reputation and hide her daughter's learning disability.
There, she meets Maria Montessori, a brilliant doctor who is developing a methodology for non-conventional children, but Maria has a secret of her own.
--- Italian and French

events.id: IFF - Parthenope-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Parthenope
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Parthenope was the mythical Siren who founded Naples. We follow the beautiful woman who bears the name of her city on a decades-long journey searching for happiness during the long summers of her youth, falling in love and meeting the many memorable characters as she becomes a formidable woman. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Parthenope was the mythical Siren who founded Naples.
We follow the beautiful woman who bears the name of her city on a decades-long journey searching for happiness during the long summers of her youth, falling in love and meeting the many memorable characters as she becomes a formidable woman.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Trust-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Trust
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Pietro, a revered teacher, and Teresa, his brilliant student, embark on an illicit and tempestuous affair. One night, while playing a game of trust and sharing, Pietro reveals a secret so shocking that it could destroy his life. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- Pietro, a revered teacher, and Teresa, his brilliant student, embark on an illicit and tempestuous affair.
One night, while playing a game of trust and sharing, Pietro reveals a secret so shocking that it could destroy his life.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Vermiglio-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Vermiglio
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- When a handsome Sicilian deserter arrives at the remote village of Vermiglio high in the snowy Alps of Alto Adige in the last year of WWII, he disrupts the ancient balance of village life. Lucia, the eldest daughter of the Graziadeis family, falls for him, with consequences that will affect everyone in unexpected ways. ---
events.description:
Details --- When a handsome Sicilian deserter arrives at the remote village of Vermiglio high in the snowy Alps of Alto Adige in the last year of WWII, he disrupts the ancient balance of village life.
Lucia, the eldest daughter of the Graziadeis family, falls for him, with consequences that will affect everyone in unexpected ways.
---

events.id: IFF - Welcome to the South-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Welcome to the South
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- A postal employee from northern Italy feigns a disability to get a transfer, but when he is caught, he is sent to a tiny village near Naples as punishment. Bringing all his prejudices, stereotypes, and fears about the South, he finds something different from what he was expecting. ---

Italian with English subtitles
events.description:
Details --- A postal employee from northern Italy feigns a disability to get a transfer, but when he is caught, he is sent to a tiny village near Naples as punishment.
Bringing all his prejudices, stereotypes, and fears about the South, he finds something different from what he was expecting.
--- Italian with English subtitles

events.id: IFF - Youth-The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington-Roxy Cinema
events.name: IFF - Youth
events.venue: The Roxy Cinema, 5 Park Road, Miramar, Wellington
events.long_description:
Details
--- Retired orchestra conductor Fred Ballinger is on vacation with his daughter Lena and his film director best friend Mick Boyle in a glamorous Swiss Alpine resort. When he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday, much to everyone’s surprise, he refuses. ---

In English
events.description:
Details --- Retired orchestra conductor Fred Ballinger is on vacation with his daughter Lena and his film director best friend Mick Boyle in a glamorous Swiss Alpine resort.
When he receives an invitation from Queen Elizabeth II to perform for Prince Philip's birthday, much to everyone’s surprise, he refuses.
--- In English
